title: Settings
content:
# Settings

2022-07-07 17:08

The **Settings** functionality enables workspace admins to customize the platform according to different business requirements. Other member roles can only set the two-factor authentication with this functionality.

# Features

As a workspace admin, you can change the following settings:

- **Logo & Favicon**

Change the logo displayed on your customized Mini Program platform and console, and the favicon displayed on the web browser tab.

![Logo.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/217662/1611219954471-bd2cd2f8-0554-4519-95c2-ab9f0cc90989.png#align=left&display=inline&height=723&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=Logo.png&originHeight=723&originWidth=1645&size=33837&status=done&style=stroke&width=1645)

- **Service Mail Preference**

Set your noreply email, which enables you to send outgoing emails that do not accept replies. This prevents your email inbox from being overloaded with replies.

![image.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/217662/1611220014452-6386e220-2a3d-48d0-901a-262a541d9b9b.png#align=left&display=inline&height=867&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=image.png&originHeight=867&originWidth=1627&size=60527&status=done&style=stroke&width=1627)

- **Domain Preference**

Customize your domain name.

![Domain preference.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/217662/1611219039139-b3892f20-1427-4623-b229-fdf380a51ad5.png#align=left&display=inline&height=865&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=Domain%20preference.png&originHeight=865&originWidth=1596&size=45517&status=done&style=stroke&width=1596)

- **Whitelist for Mini Program Testers**（Optional）

Workspace admins enable gray-box testing for designated testers, then developers can add tester accounts to the whitelist under **Mini Program** \> **Configuration** \> **Whitelist for Mini Program Testers**.

**Notes:**

- The maximum number of the tester accounts is 100.
- To use this feature, the Griver and WallerAPI version in the App Container must meet the following requirements:

- Griver 2.16.0 or higher
- WalletAPI 0.4.4 or higher

![image.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/217662/1611220076487-460d86d4-f3be-4f60-8366-156a04822211.png#align=left&display=inline&height=568&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=image.png&originHeight=568&originWidth=1638&size=43475&status=done&style=stroke&width=1638)

- **Two-Factor Authentication**

You can set up the 2FA to to add an extra layer of security for your Mini Program platform account. For more information, see [Set Two-Factor Authentication](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/platform/set-2fa) on how to enable this feature.

![image.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/217662/1611220119850-4e85cbb9-6195-4764-b013-78d67ce5315b.png#align=left&display=inline&height=367&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=image.png&originHeight=367&originWidth=1639&size=28238&status=done&style=stroke&width=1639)

- **URL of About Us**

Customize a link for your **About Us** page. By the clickable text on your portal homepage, you can link the Mini Program platform with one of your websites.

![About Us.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/217662/1611220693547-e9465f2d-9202-4aea-88a6-854f35f6b820.png#align=left&display=inline&height=571&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=About%20Us.png&originHeight=571&originWidth=1643&size=27650&status=done&style=stroke&width=1643)

- **Term of Service Agreement**

You can upload the agreement. By the clickable text on your portal homepage, your users can preview or download the agreement file.

![image.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/217662/1611221016963-bb44ae13-91f5-4d40-90d6-e300c7e4c003.png#align=left&display=inline&height=551&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=image.png&originHeight=551&originWidth=1642&size=42055&status=done&style=stroke&width=1642)

- **Copyright Notice**

You can enter the texts in the format of a symbol, a year and an owner to define your copyright notice, which is displayed on the portal homepage.

![Copyright notice.png](https://yuque.antfin.com/images/lark/0/2021/png/217662/1611221177586-3c0a97ca-835d-4870-9113-3c6657736714.png#align=left&display=inline&height=572&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&name=Copyright%20notice.png&originHeight=572&originWidth=1640&size=29031&status=done&style=stroke&width=1640)
